title: 服务器异常
author: HelloMCS
txt_content:
服务器运行的时候出现这种情况，请问大佬是怎么回事？
Encountered an unexpected exception
net.minecraft.server.v1_13_R2.ReportedException: Exception ticking world
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_13_R2.MinecraftServer.b(MinecraftServer.java:894) ~[craftbukkit-1.13.2.jar:git-Bukkit-97b0057]
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_13_R2.DedicatedServer.b(DedicatedServer.java:382) ~[craftbukkit-1.13.2.jar:git-Bukkit-97b0057]
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_13_R2.MinecraftServer.a(MinecraftServer.java:796) ~[craftbukkit-1.13.2.jar:git-Bukkit-97b0057]
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_13_R2.MinecraftServer.run(MinecraftServer.java:699) [craftbukkit-1.13.2.jar:git-Bukkit-97b0057]
        at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:748) [?:1.8.0_191]
Caused by: java.util.ConcurrentModificationException
        at java.util.LinkedList$ListItr.checkForComodification(LinkedList.java:966) ~[?:1.8.0_191]
        at java.util.LinkedList$ListItr.remove(LinkedList.java:921) ~[?:1.8.0_191]
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_13_R2.PlayerChunkMap.flush(PlayerChunkMap.java:141) ~[craftbukkit-1.13.2.jar:git-Bukkit-97b0057]
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_13_R2.WorldServer.doTick(WorldServer.java:300) ~[craftbukkit-1.13.2.jar:git-Bukkit-97b0057]
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_13_R2.MinecraftServer.b(MinecraftServer.java:890) ~[craftbukkit-1.13.2.jar:git-Bukkit-97b0057]
        ... 4 more
[14:05:49 ERROR]: This crash report has been saved to: /root/minecraft/bukkit/./crash-reports/crash-2019-03-09_14.05.49-server.txt

replies.txt_content: 对服务器有影响吗？ 如果没有可以不管的我有时候也会这样的 正常。如果有问题就看下net.minecraft.server.v1_13_R2.ReportedException: Exception ticking world这一行

replies.author: 帕帕武
replies.txt_content:
这是1.13.2固有的BUG。。。
可能这个BUG会在下一个版本内修复
